Title: The genus Pegolettia (Compositae, Inuleae).
Abstract:
The genus Pegolettia (Compositae, Inuleae) from Africa,
Arabia, and the Middle East is revised. The nine recognized species,
viz.Â P. lanceolata Harv., P. baccaridifolia Less., P gariepina A.
Anderb., P. oxyodonta DC., P. retrofracta (Thunb.) Kies, P. tenuifolia
Bolus, P. plumosa M. D. Hend., P. pinnatilobata (Klatt) O. Hoffm. ex
Dinter, and P. senegalensis Cass., are treated cladistically, and a
cladogram is presented. The species are illustrated, and their
distributions mapped. Hypotheses on the mode of speciation and the
biogeography of the group including a model of area relationships in
southern Africa are presented.
